messages.title: As your East Lothian Voice at Westminster
messages.content: Support - Scotland's right to choose. There is a better way to run our country. Scotland shouldn't be dictated to by the Westminster government. We didn't elect it. Scotland must be able to choose its own future.

messages.title: I'm asking for your vote on 12th December.
messages.content: This election is the most important for generations. To achieve what Scotland must have, the right to choose its own future. The people of Scotland must decide, not a Tory Government we've never voted for. Scotland didn't vote for a calamitous Brexit with all the damage it's causing and making Scotland uncertain. Nor did Scotland vote for austerity, which created inhuman conditions.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A calamitous Brexit threatens our economy and cost of living and is creating uncertainty among those who’ve come to Scotland and made East Lothian their home. I’ll strive to keep Scotland in the EU and mitigate the harm caused.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support urgent action to address the climate emergency
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Global warming threatens our planet, demanding urgent action locally and worldwide. I’ll build on early action at Holyrood and work with others across our shared and changing world.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support proper health and social facilities
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I’ll work for a better and fairer society for all. Ensuring fair pay and conditions for those working throughout our health and social care services, which covers all ages, is essential. I’ll push for proper facilities and support for the vulnerable and unemployed.
East Lothian is growing and changing. Appropriate and adequate transport links are essential across all age groups. I’ll push Transport Scotland for adequate and fair funding for infrastructure.
